name: Toskaspa.com
overview:
Toskaspa, the best European spa in Charleston SC, offers facials, waxing, tinting, skincare products and body massage. Toskaspa body treatments are designed to exfoliate, hydrate, detoxify, balance and refine bringing new resiliency to the skin, body and mind. Toskaspa skincare products give you an opportunity to focus on beautifying your face and experience the best relaxing facial in Charleston SC.

About Toska: - Toska European Spa Boutique has been established by Toska Husted in 2010. Toska Husted has a relevant experience in Beauty Therapy and Cosmetology. Toska provides her clients with extraordinary skin analysis and beauty care with superior results and takes every effort to give them a pleasant experience.
